remarks: A nonzero, bounded Hermitian operator divided by its norm is less than or equal to the identity operator.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: nmopleid $p |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ ( normop ` T ) e. RR /\ T =/= 0hop ) -> ( ( 1 / ( normop ` T ) ) .op T ) <_op Iop ) $.
